import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import './styles.css' import { CreateProducts } from '../products' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import products from '../productslist' import { setCart, setCartNum } from '../../App' function ProductInfo() { const [bagNumber, setBagNumber] = useState('') const [bagItems, setBagItem] = useState([]) function setBagItems(e) { for(let i = 0; i < products.length; i++) { if (e.target.name === products[i].name) { bagItems.push(products[i]) setBagItem(bagItems.push(products[i])) setCart(bagItems) } } } const handleChange = (event) => { setBagNumber(event.target.value) setCartNum(bagNumber) } const navigate = useNavigate(); function goToBag() { navigate('/shopping-cart'); } return <>
{(selectedProduct)[0].name}
{(selectedProduct)[0].snippet}
{(selectedProduct)[0].price}
{(selectedProduct)[0].description}

} export default ProductInfo
